results.name: Numerator of n!!/(n+3)!!.
reference: S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem, Graph Theory Notes of New York, Vol. XXXI, 17, 1996.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3327
S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem
program: (PARI) a(n) = numerator(prod(i=0, floor((n-1)/2), n-2*i)/prod(i=0, floor((n+2)/2), n+3-2*i)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 24 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
